title: Can I take the GED test online? - Quora

response.answer_text: The GED is an exam. You cannot take the exam online. There are online courses to help prepare for the GED exam. Degreed is one such option. It is a common misunderstanding that the GED is a course that you take. There are online high school programs, but those are not the GED. The GED allows you to demonstrate equivalency to what you would know as a high school graduate.
You must go a ProMetrix center. You cannot take it online. Test Center Search

If you mean at your home, no. All GED tests are given in a proctored setting at an official Pearson testing center. The test is administered on a computer that is connected to the internet, so it is online.
